label: 大僧都
対訳語: Senior Assistant High Priest of Buddhism
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: A Buddhist official, being one of the Buddhist Hierarchy (Sōgō). Those Buddhist priests who held this post and are mentioned in this book are as follows, being listed in the order of their appearance in the text: Jikun, Dōkyō, Eichū, Kūkai [Kōbō-Daishi], Myōfuku, Jitsubin, Nyomu, Son'i, Saikō, Heigen, Zenki, Jōshō, Enga, Yokei, Senga, Genkō, Jitsuin, Rin'e, Kyōen, Genshin, Shōhan, Kan'i, Saiun-Hōshinnō, and Genkai. [僧綱、慈訓、道鏡、永忠、空海、弘法大師、明福、実敏、如無、尊意、済高、平源、
